import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { login } from '../../actions/authActions' const LoginScreen = ({location, history}) => { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin // const redirect = location.search ? location.search.split('=')[1]: '/' useEffect(()=> { if(userInfo) { history.push('/login') } }, [history, userInfo]) const loginButton = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(login(username, password)) } return ( <>

Login to Sandbox

setUsername(e.target.value)} />
setPassword(e.target.value)} />

Forgot Password?

Don't have an account?{' '} Sign up

or
) } export default LoginScreen
